p: All the chemicals and solvents used were of analytical grade. 2, 2-Diphenyl-1-Picrylhydrazyl (DPPH), potassium ferricyanide, ferric chloride, butylated hydroxytoluene (BHT), L-ascorbic acid, quercetin, catechin, gallic acid, sodium nitroprusside, N-(1-naphthyl) ethylenediamine dihydrochloride and TCA were purchased from Merck Co. India. Glass distilled water was used to prepare all reagents and solutions.
